normalised: E D Tech is making life easier for students, folks! Finding the right scholarship can be tougher than acing your J E E, but scholarship portals are seriously changing the game. Forget sifting through endless Google searches.

unnormalised: EdTech is making life easier for students, folks! Finding the right scholarship can be tougher than acing your JEE, but scholarship portals are seriously changing the game. Forget sifting through endless Google searches.
normalised: These platforms are like matchmaking services for your academic dreams. Think Shaadi dot com, but for scholarships! Sites like Vidya Lakshmi and Buddy four Study are curating tons of opportunities. You can filter by course, location (from Kerala to Kashmir!), and even caste.

unnormalised: These platforms are like matchmaking services for your academic dreams. Think Shaadi.com, but for scholarships! Sites like Vidya Lakshmi and Buddy4Study are curating tons of opportunities. You can filter by course, location (from Kerala to Kashmir!), and even caste.
normalised: Imagine, just before Onam, securing a scholarship that covers your entire B Tech at I I T Delhi! Less stress, more biryani, right? Many of these portals also offer application support and mentorship.

unnormalised: Imagine, just before Onam, securing a scholarship that covers your entire B.Tech at IIT Delhi! Less stress, more biryani, right? Many of these portals also offer application support and mentorship.
normalised: Plus, many now boast A I powered matching, suggesting scholarships based on your profile. It's still early days, but these platforms are definitely a welcome upgrade for students across India. Say goodbye to those hefty education loans of rupee ten lakhs or more, and hello to a brighter, debt-free future. They're even expanding to cover scholarships for studying abroad!
